The retractable large moderate soft brush is ideal for cleaning the gaps between laptop and keyboard. The computer cleaning kit is a comprehensive cleaning set that almost cleans everything, keeping your devices clean and organized.
Cleaning earphones Cleaning tablet Cleaning lens

High-quality microfiber cloth is very soft and durable. The cleaning cloth is made of high quality suede and can be strongly bonded with the Velcro on the back of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick cleanup of my keyboard with this kit
reviews.reviewText: This is a retractable soft brush with attachments stored in a flip case on the handle. The soft brush removes crumbs and dust from between the keys. The attachments include:Wide brushSuede-like monitor wiper (back of brush)Webcam lens swapbetween-keys swapNarrow brush (that doubles as the handle for the other tools)Small metal pickSpray with cleaning solutionKey cap pullerThis kit is compact and works well; in a few minutes I had the keyboard cleaned up and swabbed between the keys to remove more grime. If I had removed the key caps, I could have done an even more thorough job.The monitor wiper on the back is stuck on with velcro; I presume you could find similar material to replace it or at least wash it in warm soapy water and let it dry when it gets dirty. The little spray only holds about 1 ml of solution but could be refilled.Highly recommended for the desk drawer as it takes up no more space than a stapler and it does a very good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's super portable and easy to use. The brushes are extremely soft, and the tools really help the cleaning process. I went through considerably less q-tips lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars needs more cleaner spray
reviews.reviewText: super good. but cleaner is like a quarter full for an alr tiny bottle, so it gives u like 3 sprays before u have to refill (doesn’t come w any btw)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super convenient, cute, and it works
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like that it has almost everything you need to clean your keyboard, laptop, and phone. Comes with replacements and I haven’t had to replace anything after multiple uses. It feels well made even though its plastic and none of the hairs come out while cleaning. Its a great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just love this keyboard cleaner. It has everything you need to clean your computer keyboard and is small enough to carry with you. I am constantly trying to get crumbs and dust out of my keys and the brush that comes with this is perfect or you can use the key pulled and take out the individual keys to get a deep clean. A little liquid cleaner added to the spritzer and you can easily clean your screen especially after an unfortunate sneeze. I highly recommend this little kit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Versatile Cleaning Kit
reviews.reviewText: I am genuinely impressed with the cleaning kit. The orange and white tool, particularly the edge of the cleaning pad, proved to be highly effective in restoring cleanliness. What surprised me was the durability of the cleaning pad; despite the mess I confronted, it held up remarkably well. With the inclusion of extra replacement pads, it instills confidence in the kit's long-term utility. Additionally, the unexpected bonus of a lint-free microfiber cloth adds further value to this comprehensive cleaning solution. Overall, a remarkable and highly satisfactory kit for maintaining cleanliness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best price for quality
reviews.reviewText: Don’t be alarmed by title, the quality is phenomenal and so the fact it’s this cheap is wonderful, have used it to clean my iPad, phone, headphones, my entire nasty keyboard and mouse, wonderful item

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really good for cleaning electronics. The size is also good

Das Reinigungsset hat mich wirklich überzeugt, und ich gebe eine Bewertung von 5/5 Sternen. Dieses Reinigungsset mit 10 verschiedenen Werkzeugen ist praktisch und bietet eine zuverlässige Lösung für die Reinigung von Tastaturen, Displays und anderen Oberflächen.Die Bürste und der Keyboard Cleaner ermöglichen eine effektive Tastaturreinigung, während der Bildschirmreiniger sich schonend für Displays, Handys, Laptops, PCs und Kameras eignet. Die Vielseitigkeit dieses Sets macht es zu einer praktischen Lösung für die Pflege elektronischer Geräte.Die Werkzeuge sind gut verarbeitet und bieten eine sinnvolle Auswahl für unterschiedliche Reinigungsaufgaben. Insgesamt bin ich mit dem Ordilend Tastatur Reinigungsset sehr zufrieden und kann es jedem empfehlen, der eine zuverlässige Reinigungslösung sucht. Mit 5/5 Sternen bewerte ich es als verlässlichen Helfer für die Pflege meiner technischen Geräte.
salut j embrasse toute les femmes et une poinier de main aux gad bonne journee a tous bye

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What can i say, it does what it says it will do and does it well. I have a habit of eating while using my PC and it got the keyboard spotless. Haven't used some of the other tools but they look like they'll come in useful. Definitely worth the money

reviews.reviewTitle: Kaum was zu bemängeln. Absolute Kaufempfehlung!
reviews.reviewText: Man kommt überall hin mit dem dazugehörigen Zubehör. Die Borsten sind super weich und leicht magnetisch. Ziehen den Staub leicht an. Säubert äußerst ordentlich! Dazu gibt es noch Ersatzteile. Bin echt zufrieden.Die einzigen zwei Dinge die mich stören sind die Transparentdeckel. Diese schieben sich zu leicht auf und fallen ab wenn man die große grobe Bürste benutzt (Beeinträchtigt aber nicht das die Teile herausfallen). Könnten besser einrasten. Und die Große Putzfläche auf der Rückseite für den Bildschirm könnte weicher sein. Man könnte meinen man benutze Schnörgelpapier.... Aber das war es dann auch.

reviews.reviewTitle: 🧽 Limpieza eficaz y compacta para diferentes dispositivos. 🧽
reviews.reviewText: Recientemente adquirí este producto para efectuar una buena limpieza para teclados, móviles, pantallas y más, y debo decir que ha superado mis expectativas. Este kit de limpieza se ha convertido en un producto esencial para mantener limpios y en perfecto estado todos mis dispositivos electrónicos.Lo más destacable de este producto es su versatilidad. El kit incluye un pincel especialmente diseñado para eliminar el polvo y las partículas de los teclados, los dispositivos móviles y las pantallas de los monitores. Además, es excepcionalmente útil para limpiar las lentes de las cámaras, asegurando una limpieza profunda sin dañar los dispositivos.En total, el kit incluye lo siguiente:☑️ Punta de bolígrafo de metal☑️ Esponja flocada☑️ Cepillo fino y suave☑️ Bolígrafo de limpieza de lentes de plástico suave☑️ 5 paños de repuesto☑️ Paño de limpieza de microfibra grande☑️ Spray reciclable de 2 mlOtro aspecto a resaltar es su diseño compacto y portátil. Viene en una caja con un diseño patentado que es fácil de llevar, lo que lo hace ideal para usar tanto en casa como en la oficina o en viajes. La inclusión de un spray en el kit es un plus, ya que permite aplicar la solución de limpieza directamente sobre las superficies a tratar.En resumen, una herramienta indispensable para cualquiera que desee mantener sus equipos en perfectas condiciones. Su facilidad de uso, efectividad y diseño compacto lo convierten en un producto imprescindible.Resumen:✅ Versatilidad para limpiar teclados, móviles, pantallas, lentes de cámaras y más.✅ Pincel especializado para una limpieza suave y efectiva.✅ Diseño de caja compacta y portátil, ideal para uso en múltiples lugares.✅ Incluye spray para una aplicación de limpieza directa y eficiente.
